scripts.build: pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.db:init: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const {Pool}=require('pg'); const pool=new Pool({user:'postgres',host:'localhost',database:'postgres',password:'password',port:5432}); const sql=fs.readFileSync('packages/server/src/db/schema.sql','utf8'); pool.query(sql).then(()=>process.exit(0)).catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1)})"
